project_plan.name: Temperature Converter Command-Line Tool
project_plan.description: Create a command-line Python tool that allows users to convert temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin.

task.name: Implement temperature conversion functions (Celsius, Fahrenheit, Kelvin)
Create a command-line interface for user input
Handle input validation for temperature values and unit selections
Write tests for the conversion functions and command-line interface
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
